name: Elemental Devourer
description:
After taking Electro DMG, stack 1 level of Elemental Devourer. (Max 2 levels)
When 2 levels of Elemental Devourer have been gained, character deals +1 Electro DMG and takes +2 Electro DMG.
descriptionraw: After taking $[K104], stack 1 level of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Devourer</color>. (Max 2 levels)\nWhen 2 levels of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Devourer</color> have been gained, character deals +1 $[K104] and takes +2 $[K104].
descriptionreplaced: After taking {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>, stack 1 level of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Devourer</color>. (Max 2 levels)\nWhen 2 levels of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Devourer</color> have been gained, character deals +1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> and takes +2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.
